required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Coronary and Structural Interventions Ulm - Transcatheter Mitral Valve Repair (CSI-Ulm-TMVR)
clinical_study.official_title: Coronary and Structural Interventions Ulm - Transcatheter Mitral Valve Repair (CSI-Ulm-TMVR)

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the long-term results after transcatheter mitral valve repair

detailed_description.textblock: Patients with transcatheter mitral valve repair are followed for 10 years to demonstrate efficacy and safety.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: CE certified mitral valve repair systems

primary_outcome.measure: Major adverse cerebral and cardiac events
primary_outcome.description: Major adverse cerebral and cardiac events

arm_group.arm_group_label: CE certified mitral valve repair systems
arm_group.description: CE certified transcatheter mitral valve repair systems

intervention.intervention_name: CE certified mitral valve repair systems
intervention.description: Patients receive a transcatheter mitral valve repair with CE certified transcatheter mitral repair systems.
intervention.arm_group_label: CE certified mitral valve repair systems

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- mitral valve regurgitation
- transcatheter mitral valve repair
Exclusion Criteria:
- no written informed consent

results_reference.citation: Seeger J, Markovic S, Kessler M, Rottbauer W, Wöhrle J. Apixaban After Percutaneous Edge-to-Edge Mitral Valve Repair in Patients With Maintained Sinus Rhythm. JACC Cardiovasc Interv. 2019 Jan 28;12(2):214-216. doi: 10.1016/j.jcin.2018.11.009.

Seeger J, Müller P, Gonska B, Scharnbeck D, Markovic S, Walcher D, Rottbauer W, Wöhrle J. Percutaneous Mitral Valve Repair With the MitraClip in Primary Compared With Secondary Mitral Valve Regurgitation Using the Mitral Valve Academic Research Consortium Criteria. J Invasive Cardiol. 2017 Apr;29(4):145-150.
